name: CRICBUZZ__GET_LIVE_MATCHES
description: Retrieves all currently live cricket matches with real-time scores, match status, and links to detailed scorecards.

name: CRICBUZZ__GET_UPCOMING_SCHEDULE
description: Fetches upcoming international cricket matches with comprehensive scheduling details including dates, times, venues, and series information.

pages.description: Number of pages to scrape for upcoming matches. Each page contains multiple matches. Must be between 1 and 10. Defaults to 6.

name: CRICBUZZ__GET_FULL_SCORECARD
description: Retrieves comprehensive match details including complete batting and bowling scorecards, fall of wickets, and match information for a specific cricket match.

scorecard_url.description: The full URL of the Cricbuzz scorecard page (e.g., 'https://www.cricbuzz.com/live-cricket-scorecard/...').

name: CRICBUZZ__GET_MATCH_DETAILS
description: Extracts detailed information about a specific cricket match including header, status, scores, and comprehensive match information.

match_url.description: The full URL of the Cricbuzz match page (e.g., 'https://www.cricbuzz.com/live-cricket-scores/...').

name: CRICBUZZ__GET_SQUADS
description: Retrieves team squads including playing XI, bench players, and support staff for a specific cricket match with detailed player information and roles.

squads_url.description: The full URL of the Cricbuzz match squads page (e.g., 'https://www.cricbuzz.com/cricket-match-squads/...').
